title: Side chair, one of a pair
description: Side Chairs, pair of, with hoop backs and shaped splats; attenuated cabriole legs in front, end in spatulate feet. The knees are carved with a shell motif. Slip seats upholstered in blue and silver brocade.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Washburn and Miss Elizabeth Pope Washburn in Memory of Mr. John Washburn
